title: Rebrand to “MHS Habibur Blog” and refresh sample blog content + sitemap

requirements.summary: Replace all user-visible “MyBlog” branding with “MHS Habibur Blog” across header, site config metadata, and footer copyright.
acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text shows exactly “MHS Habibur Blog” (no remaining “MyBlog” in the header).
Footer copyright line shows “© {year} MHS Habibur Blog. All rights reserved.”.
A case-sensitive search for the standalone string “MyBlog” in user-facing UI text no longer finds the old title (excluding URLs like https://myblog.com if still present).

file_operations.description: Update site-wide metadata to use `name: 'MHS Habibur Blog'` (and ensure any other user-facing metadata strings no longer display “MyBlog”).
Update the header brand text from “MyBlog” to exactly “MHS Habibur Blog”.
Update the footer copyright line to “© {year} MHS Habibur Blog. All rights reserved.” and ensure no remaining “MyBlog” appears in the footer UI text.
Update the Home page SEO description text to remove the standalone “MyBlog” brand mention and reflect “MHS Habibur Blog” branding.

requirements.summary: Replace fallback sample blog posts with exactly 5 professional posts about Online Income and Digital Marketing (with full titles, slugs, excerpts, substantial content, and realistic timestamps).
acceptanceCriteria: `samplePosts` contains exactly 5 posts and all 5 are about Online Income and/or Digital Marketing (remove/replace the existing generic web-dev sample posts).
Each post has: non-empty `title`, unique `slug`, non-empty `excerpt`, non-empty `content`, and a valid `published` timestamp.
Blog list page renders 5 cards and each navigates to a working detail page for its slug.
Post content is professional, actionable, and formatted as readable multi-paragraph text (not a single short paragraph).

file_operations.description: Replace the existing fallback posts with exactly 5 new, professional posts focused on Online Income and Digital Marketing; ensure each has a catchy title, unique URL-safe slug, clear excerpt, substantial multi-paragraph content (optionally with bullet lists), and realistic `published` timestamps in `bigint` form.

requirements.summary: Update the static sitemap to reflect the 5 new blog post slugs and remove any old sample post URLs.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/sitemap.xml` includes `<url><loc>.../blog/{slug}</loc>...</url>` entries for all 5 new slugs.
`frontend/public/sitemap.xml` does not list blog post URLs for any removed/replaced sample slugs.

file_operations.description: Remove the old sample blog post URL entries and add sitemap `<url>` entries for each of the 5 new fallback post slugs under `/blog/{slug}`.
Update the sitemap maintenance notes/examples (if they reference old sample slugs) so documentation matches the new set of 5 blog post slugs.
